ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.5'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Provides several direct search optimization algorithms based on the simplex method. The provided algorithms are direct search algorithms, i.e. algorithms which do not use the derivative of the cost function. They are based on the update of a simplex. The following algorithms are available: the fixed shape simplex method of Spendley, Hext and Himsworth (unconstrained optimization with a fixed shape simplex), the variable shape simplex method of Nelder and Mead (unconstrained optimization with a variable shape simplex made), and Box's complex method (constrained optimization with a variable shape simplex).

Provides several direct search optimization algorithms based on the simplex method. The provided algorithms are direct search algorithms, i.e. algorithms which do not use the derivative of the cost function. They are based on the update of a simplex. The following algorithms are available: the fixed shape simplex method of Spendley, Hext and Himsworth (unconstrained optimization with a fixed shape simplex), the variable shape simplex method of Nelder and Mead (unconstrained optimization with a variable shape simplex made), and Box's complex method (constrained optimization with a variable shape simplex).

name: r-neldermead
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.0-13" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-neldermead
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/neldermead_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/neldermead/neldermead_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e7199002ffae4a7f272dc5c74a244afdec31505c2e6a23a2383af33ed6f4bf96

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-optimbase >=1.0_9
    - r-optimsimplex >=1.0_7
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-optimbase >=1.0_9
    - r-optimsimplex >=1.0_7

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('neldermead')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('neldermead')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=neldermead
  license: CeCILL-2
  summary: "Provides several direct search optimization algorithms based on the simplex method. The provided algorithms are direct search algorithms, i.e. algorithms which do not use the derivative of the cost function. They are based on the update of a simplex. The following algorithms are available: the fixed shape simplex
    method of Spendley, Hext and Himsworth (unconstrained optimization with a fixed shape simplex), the variable shape simplex method of Nelder and Mead (unconstrained optimization with a variable shape simplex made), and Box's complex method (constrained optimization with a variable shape simplex)."
  license_family: OTHER
  license_file: Licence_CeCILL_V2-en.txt

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - xhochy

# Package: neldermead
# Type: Package
# Title: R Port of the 'Scilab' Neldermead Module
# Version: 1.0-11
# Date: 2018-02-12
# Author: Sebastien Bihorel, Michael Baudin (author of the original module)
# Maintainer: Sebastien Bihorel <sb.pmlab@gmail.com>
# Depends: optimbase (>= 1.0-9), optimsimplex (>= 1.0-7), methods
# Description: Provides several direct search optimization algorithms based on the simplex method. The provided algorithms are direct search algorithms, i.e. algorithms which do not use the derivative of the cost function. They are based on the update of a simplex. The following algorithms are available: the fixed shape simplex method of Spendley, Hext and Himsworth (unconstrained optimization with a fixed shape simplex), the variable shape simplex method of Nelder and Mead (unconstrained optimization with a variable shape simplex made), and Box's complex method (constrained optimization with a variable shape simplex).
# License: CeCILL-2
# LazyLoad: yes
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-02-13 03:05:43 UTC; sebastien
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-02-14 00:39:25 UTC
